QuestData.Title: Canyon Romp
QuestData.Description: <The gnomecorder hums.>$B$BThe first order of business is a romp through the Redridge Canyons, directly north of Lakeshire. Kill every gnome that you see... woops, did I say gnome? I meant gnoll. Kill every GNOLL that you see and take their collars as proof of deed.$B$BI must warn you, $n; while you are out there, watch out for ettins. My scouts have reported seeing huge, bloodthirsty ettins roaming the canyons lately. Stay out of their way if you want to remain alive.$B$BSolomon out. I'll be in touch.
QuestData.RewardText: <The gnomecorder crackles and pops.>$B$BGood work, $n. I've just been handed some important information. It would appear that our most hated enemy, the Blackrock orcs, have wised up...$B$B<The gnomecorder whirs as a compartment opens up.>$B$BI've transferred a few silver over to you for the gnome, erm, gnoll kills.
